subject: Investment trust
body:
Greetings,

I am Mr. Ammar Hussain Finance and Account, Qatar Petroleum. I have one hundred million dollars for Investment.

Contact me if you are interested, I have all what it will take to move the fund to you as a contract fund to avoid every query. I will give you more details upon the receipt of your response on :mr.ammarhussain0@gmail.com<mailto:mr.ammarhussain0@gmail.com>

Regards,

Ammar Hussain
Finance and Account.
Qatar Petroleum
Email: mr.ammarhussain0@gmail.com<mailto:mr.ammarhussain0@gmail.com>

subject: Re: Investment trust
body:
Hello Mr. Ammar Hussain,

I hope this message finds you well. Your proposal sounds quite interesting, although I must admit, it's a bit overwhelming to think about such a large sum of money! 

Could you please provide more details about this? For instance, what exactly does it mean to move the fund as a contract fund? And what would be required from my end?

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Jerome

subject: Re: Investment trust
body:
Hello Mr. Ammar Hussain,

I hope this message finds you well. Your proposal sounds quite interesting, and I would love to learn more about it. Could you please provide me with more details? For instance, what exactly does the process involve? And how did you come across my contact information?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Jerome
